com.spectralogic.ds3client

Class Ds3ClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spectralogic.ds3client.Ds3ClientBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<Ds3Client>

    public class Ds3ClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Builder<Ds3Client>
    A Builder class used to create a Ds3Client instance. This allows you to customize the behavior of a Ds3Client. For instance, the number of times that the Ds3Client instance will perform a 307 redirect before throwing an error can be customized with the withRedirectRetries(int) as well as setting a proxy with withProxy(String).

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Ds3ClientBuilder create(java.lang.String endpoint,
                                      Credentials creds)
        Returns a Builder which is used to customize the behavior of the Ds3Client library.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - The DS3 endpoint the library should connect to.
        creds - The Credentials used for connecting to a DS3 endpoint.
        Returns:
        The Builder for the Ds3ClientImpl object.

      • fromEnv

        public static Ds3ClientBuilder fromEnv()
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a Build which already has the endpoint and credentials populated from environment variables. DS3_ENDPOINT, DS3_ACCESS_KEY, and DS3_SECRET_KEY are all used when creating the builder. This will also detect if http_proxy is set, and if it is will us it when creating the client and set the proxy variable accordingly.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • withHttps

        public Ds3ClientBuilder withHttps(boolean secure)
        Specifies if the library should use HTTP or HTTPS. The default is HTTP.
        Parameters:
        secure - True will use HTTPS, false will use HTTP.
        Returns:
        The current builder.

      • withBufferSize

        public Ds3ClientBuilder withBufferSize(int bufferSize)
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - The size of the buffer to be used when writing content out to DS3.
        Returns:
        The current builder.

      • withCertificateVerification

        public Ds3ClientBuilder withCertificateVerification(boolean certificateVerification)
        Specifies if the library should perform SSL certificate validation.

      • withProxy

        public Ds3ClientBuilder withProxy(java.lang.String proxy)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets a HTTP proxy.
        Parameters:
        proxy - The endpoint of the HTTP proxy.
        Returns:
        The current builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - This will be thrown if the proxy endpoint is not a valid URI.

      • withRedirectRetries

        public Ds3ClientBuilder withRedirectRetries(int retries)
        Sets the number of retries the library will attempt to perform when it receives 307 redirects from a DS3 appliance. The default is 5.
        Parameters:
        retries - The number of times the library should perform retries on 307.
        Returns:
        The current builder.

      • build

        public Ds3Client build()
        Returns a new Ds3Client instance.
        Specified by:
        build in interface Builder<Ds3Client>
